Name: Great Northern
Ingredients: 15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of half orange slice.
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Your choice of honey will greatly influence this drink which harnesses the character of aquavit to great effect with white wine and citrusy notes.
History: Created in 2011 by Jessica Gonzalez at Death & Company in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Great Northern contains 249 calories
